xwikidoc.content: #set($processor = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("CurrikiCode.LoginToDownloadExceptionsProcessor"))## #set($junk=$processor.init($xwiki, $context, $request))## 1 $doc.name $processor.seedLoginToDownloadEscapes() The webapp context's attribute LoginToDownloadEscapes is now {pre} $request.getSession().getServletContext().getAttribute("LoginToDownloadEscapes") {/pre} You may want to edit LoginToDownloadExceptions. Each line there is a space name that is in the exceptions. Do not forget to reload this page once.
